name: Shooting Star (itch) (man_gola)
description:
Title: Shooting Star

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Shooting Star is a physics-based puzzle game where you must aim your cannon and bounce projectiles to the goal. Obstacles will be in the path so avoid them or use them to bounce to the goal. 

Instructions: Move your mouse to aim the cannon and bounce projectiles towards the goal. The further the mouse is away from the cannon, the further your shots will be.

Game Design Team 

Thomas Nguyen – Game Designer
